name: recursively_misremembered
description:
recursively_misremembered is an entry for #GameDev101Jam2, which had a theme of "LUCIDITY." It was made in Godot in about three to four days. I know it's tagged as "horror," but it's more... weird, not really scary so much.

This is version 1.01 (1.0 was never publicly released), which fixes a crash-inducing memory leak on Linux and contains a less ear-piercing scene transition sound.

Headphones warning: The default volume can be a bit high.

Controls:

  • Walk with arrow keys or WASD
  • Press K to interact with objects in the world (which you can do when an exclamation mark pops up)
  • Use the mouse to navigate the dialogue system (or a combination of TAB/SHIFT-TAB, SPACEBAR and RETURN, but I don't recommend it)

Objective:

  • Explore the rooms until you get to the end
  • Read a lot of text probably

Graphical assets used:

  • Various images generated by @elegiac_ai, which is maintained by @nemikomusic. The images are not published under a specific license but "free to use for any purpose" and available at https://twitter.com/elegiac_ai
  • Certain items from the 1-Bit-Pack and Pixel Platformer packs by Kenney, licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal, available at https://kenney.nl/assets/
  • Several images from the OpenMoji project by various contributors, licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0, available at https://openmoji.org/
  • Psychologist's Office picture by Sozavisimost, licensed under a Simplified Pixabay License, available at https://pixabay.com/photos/psychologist-psychology-thoughts-5154576/

Sound effects:

  • A few sound effects from the Sci-Fi Sounds package by Kenney, licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal, available at https://kenney.nl/assets/
  • UI Click by EminYILDRIM, licensed under the Attribution License, available at https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/536108/
  • Page Flip Sound Effect 1 by SoundJay, available at https://www.soundjay.com/page-flip-sounds-1.html
  • Additional sound effects by ZapSplat, available at https://www.zapsplat.com (specifically the footsteps)
